name: Conflict: Desert Storm II
summary: Conflict: Desert Storm II (Conflict: Desert Storm II: Back to Baghdad in North America) is a tactical shooter video game developed by Pivotal Games and published by SCi Games for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 2, Xbox and GameCube. It is the second installment in the Conflict series.
info:
• 中文名: 冲突：沙漠风暴2

  • 平台: Xbox
  • 平台: NGC
  • 游戏类型: TPS / Tactical shooter
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2003年9月19日
